about_the_game:
Dive into an amazing adventure! The girls and people of the Kingdoms need your help! Learn new techniques. Save the girls. Restore the world.

Rebuild your village, manage your estate, build dwellings for the needy. Free the people from slavery!

A lot of quests, dangerous battles with bloodthirsty creatures, beautiful girls are waiting for you.
You have to decide the fate of entire states and individuals in them.

content_descriptors.notes: The content contains alcohol abuse, violence, slavery, violent scenes.

name: Seven Demons

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP / Vista / 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium IV (2.0 GHz) / AMD Athlon XP 2200+
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 32 Mb / DirectX 9
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
